articles.title: 13 Games from Last Year's Xbox Showcase Are Still Missing - GameRant
articles.description: Xbox succeeds in releasing 74% of the games it showed at last year's Xbox Showcase, but 13 are still missing in action.
articles.content: Gaming giant Xbox promised to release all the games featured at its showcase last year by June 2023, and it succeeded in releasing 74% of them. The 2022 Xbox Showcase was full of exciting game reveal… [+2353 chars]
